channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: EUのDSAを遵守するため、グーグルは広告透明性センターを拡大し、EUの広告ターゲティングに関する詳細の提供、研究者のアクセス増加などを計画している（Foo Yun Chee/ロイター）。
item.description:
Foo Yun Chee / Reuters:
To comply with the EU DSA, Google plans to expand its Ads Transparency Center and offer more details on EU ad targeting, increase researcher access, and more  —  Google will provide more information on targeted advertisements and give researchers more access to data on how its products work …

item.title: インタファクス：モスクワの裁判所、WSJ記者エヴァン・ゲルシュコビッチ被告の公判前勾留を8月30日から2023年11月30日まで延長、ゲルシュコビッチ被告は審理に出席（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
Interfax: a Moscow court extends WSJ reporter Evan Gershkovich's pre-trial detention to November 30, 2023 from August 30; Gershkovich attended the hearing  —  U.S. reporter Evan Gershkovich had his pre-trial detention extended by three months by a Russian court on Thursday, Interfax reported, on charges of espionage that he denies.

item.title: 情報筋TikTokは、TikTok Shopの利用を強制するため、Amazonや他のeコマースサイトへのリンクを禁止する計画。情報筋によると、Shopは2023年に米国で5億ドル以上の損失を被る（Erin Woo/The Information）。
item.description:
Erin Woo / The Information:
Sources: TikTok plans to bar links to Amazon and other e-commerce sites to force people to use TikTok Shop; source says Shop will lose $500M+ in the US in 2023  —  The cost of TikTok's online shopping expansion in the U.S. is beginning to add up.  —  TikTok Shop, the app's nascent shopping service …

item.title: Antenna：ネットフリックスの7月の新規米国ユーザー数は〜260万人で、他の有料ストリーミングサービスより多いが、2023年6月より26％減少、〜23％がネットフリックスの広告ティアに登録（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Antenna: Netflix added ~2.6M new US users in July, more than any other paid streaming service but down 26% from June 2023; ~23% signed up for Netflix's ad tier  —  - The streaming service had more sign-ups than any other in July  — Netflix user growth in the US had stopped in recent years

item.title: CNN、NYT、ロイターのようなアウトレットで最初に登場したニュース記事を、クレジットなしでリライトするためにAIチャットボットを使用している37のサイトを発見した分析（NewsGuard）。
item.description:
NewsGuard:
An analysis finds 37 sites that are using AI chatbots to rewrite news articles, which first appeared in outlets like CNN, the NYT, and Reuters, without credit  —  NewsGuard has identified 37 sites that use artificial intelligence to repackage articles from mainstream news sources without providing credit …

item.title: 情報源WBDは、ジム・スキウト、ビアンナ・ゴロドリガ、クリスティアン・アマンプールらが司会を務めるCNNのオリジナル番組を新たに立ち上げ、Maxで配信する計画（Brian Steinberg/Variety）
item.description:
Brian Steinberg / Variety:
Sources: WBD plans to launch new original programs from CNN that will stream on Max, hosted by Jim Sciutto, Bianna Golodryga, Christiane Amanpour, and others  —  Jim Sciutto, Bianna Golodryga, Rahel Solomon and Christiane Amanpour are among the CNN journalists who have been tapped to take part in the effort …

item.title: FCCは、Fox TVのWTXF（フィリー）の免許更新を拒否するよう求めるコメントを募集している。
item.description:
Todd Shields / Bloomberg:
The FCC invites comment on a request to deny a license renewal for Fox TV's WTXF in Philly, after a group challenged the renewal due to Fox News' legal history  —  - Participation would serve public interest, agency says  — Group challenged Fox renewal over 2020 election coverage

item.title: テキサス・トリビューンのソナル・シャーCEOがレイオフを発表、景気低迷などを理由とし、コピーデスクのチーフがレイオフされたと投稿した（Angela Fu/Poynter）
item.description:
Angela Fu / Poynter:
Texas Tribune CEO Sonal Shah announces layoffs, blaming a weakened economy and more; the outlet's copy desk chief posted that the copy desk had been laid off  —  CEO Sonal Shah told staff that 2023 has been uniquely challenging for the outlet, which many have come to see as a model for nonprofit journalism

item.title: ニールセンはアマゾンの視聴率データを木曜ナイトフットボールに取り入れる予定。昨シーズン、アマゾンの社内数字はニールセンの数字を約18％上回った（Joe Flint/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Joe Flint / Wall Street Journal:
Nielsen plans to incorporate Amazon's viewership data for Thursday Night Football; last season, Amazon's internal numbers were nearly 18% higher than Nielsen's  —  The move is expected to boost ratings of games; Amazon's own numbers were nearly 18% higher than Nielsen's last season.

item.title: 情報筋：元ニューヨーク・タイムズCEOでBBC事務局長のマーク・トンプソンがCNNのトップ有力候補、トンプソンは2020年にニューヨーク・タイムズを退社（Ben Smith/Semafor）
item.description:
Ben Smith / Semafor:
Sources: former New York Times CEO and BBC Director-General Mark Thompson is a leading candidate to head CNN; Thompson left The New York Times in 2020  —  The Scoop  —  The former New York Times and BBC chief Mark Thompson is a leading candidate to lead CNN, according to people familiar …

item.title: 情報筋アマゾン、WBD、第3の放送局が、メディアパートナーを増やそうとしているNASCARから、夏の6～8レースの放映権を獲得するために競争している（Bloomberg）。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Amazon, WBD, and a third broadcaster are competing for the rights to six to eight summer races from NASCAR, which is trying to add more media partners  —  - Racing league looks to boost revenue with multiple partners  — Fox and NBC are still in position to renew their deals

item.title: Spotify、カスタマイズページ、新しいインプレッション分析、プレビュー編集コントロール、Megaphoneパブリッシャー向けダッシュボードなど、新しいポッドキャスターツールを導入（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Spotify introduces new podcaster tools, including customized pages, new impression analytics, preview editing controls, and a dashboard for Megaphone publishers  —  Following Apple's announcement of podcast creator tools for subscriptions on Monday, Spotify today also introduced …

item.title: ヤフーがコモンストックを買収、個人投資家が証券口座情報をもとにインサイトを共有できるようにするため2020年に開始、コモンストックは3400万ドルを調達していた（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Yahoo acquires CommonStock, launched in 2020 to let retail investors share insights based on their brokerage account information; CommonStock had raised ~$34M  —  Yahoo has acquired CommonStock, a social platform designed for retail investors to share insights based on information linked directly …

item.title: ロッテン・トマト、批評家アウトリーチと助成金プログラムを拡大し、LGBTQやその他のグループを支援 5年間で1000人以上の批評家を加え、60万ドル以上を寄付（Rebecca Sun/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Rebecca Sun / Hollywood Reporter:
Rotten Tomatoes expands its Critics Outreach and Grant Program to support LGBTQ and other groups, after adding 1,000+ critics and giving $600K+ in five years  —  The review platform has linked up with GALECA, Gold House and the National Association of Black Journalists as its donations to diversify the field surpass the $600,000 mark.

item.title: WBDのデイヴィッド・ザスラブCEOの1年目を振り返ってのプロフィール。
item.description:
Clare Malone / New Yorker:
A profile of WBD CEO David Zaslav after the company's rocky first year, as some doubt that he is up to the task of building a new entertainment industry power  —  The C.E.O. of a huge conglomerate takes on an entertainment business in turmoil.  —  In 1941, a couple from New York bought …
